snippet: On his weekly radio show, Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg insisted that his Spanish, which was often mocked throughout his mayoralty, was getting better.
abstract: New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg, who is preparing to leave office after 12 years, refutes critics who have mocked his past attempts to speak Spanish, saying that his Spanish is improving.
lead_paragraph: On his weekly radio show, Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg insisted that his Spanish, which was often mocked throughout his mayoralty, was getting better.

headline.main: Bloomberg Says Critics of His Spanish Need to ‘Get a Life’
headline.print_headline: Bloomberg Says Critics of His Spanish Need to ‘Get a Life’
